name: Candidus Caves
description:
Magnus has finally come of age and it's time to go on his first trip to "Candidus Caves" with his father.

Controls

GAMEPAD (Strongly Recommended)

  • D-PAD/Joystick - Movement
  • X - Action Button/Dash/Glide
  • A - Jump

KEYBOARD

  • WASD - Move
  • ENTER - Action Button/Dash/Glide
  • SPACE - Jump
  • Z/X/ENTER - Dash

CREDITS

MUSIC 

All music in the game was made by and used with the permission of Hudson Glover

Tracks used

  • Noise Angel
  • Prelude of a Cursed Forest Sprite
  • Parti
  • Baby Loves Marimbas
  • City Symphony
  • Summer Collection
  • Feel So Good

ART

  • Penusbmic - Characters
  • Reesma - House Interior
  • Daivuk - Outdoors
  • Jasontomlee - Effects
  • Connor Covert (not online) - Gem Animations

ASSETS

  • Pixel Crushers Dialogue System
  • Rewired Input System
  • Uppon Hill Platform Shadow
  • Easy Credits 2
